submapp.map2d.count_differences¶

submapp.map2d.count_differences(map1, map2, ignore_missing_vector: bool = True) → numpy.ndarray¶

Number of differences between the classes of map1 and map2

Parameters

  • map1 (Map2d) – First Map2d

  • map2 (Map2d) – Second Map2d (map1 and map2 are interchangeable)

  • ignore_missing_vector (bool, optional) – Determine whether a difference should be ignored if a missing vector is involded in map1 or map2. If False the results is incremented even though either map1 or map2 is representing a missing value Defaults to True

Return type

int

Warning

map1 and map2 should have been constructed by the same SOM) Otherwise, the result returned does not make any sense.

They must have the same number of inputs mapped too.

See also

  • distance_between_labels

  • confusion_matrix
